t:
Mr. Patel's kids were about to celebrate their 5th birthday. He picked a sewing kit as a gift for his daughter, Priya. For his son, Krishna, he chose a cool model of the solar system.

30 years flew by.

On a big stage, a man's voice boomed, “Please welcome Mr. Krishnamurthy Patel, the designer behind this year's amazing Vogue collection!”

Meanwhile, on the other side of the world, a news reporter announced, “Today, a history-making moment! Mrs. Vishnupriya Patel is aboard ISRO's very first manned mission to Mars!”
c:
Mr. Patel's kids were about to celebrate their 5th birthday. He picked a sewing kit as a gift for his daughter, Priya. For his son, Krishna, he chose a cool model of the solar system.

30 years flew by.

On a big stage, a man's voice boomed, “Please welcome Mr. Krishnamurthy Patel, the designer behind this year's amazing Vogue collection!”

Meanwhile, on the other side of the world, a news reporter announced, “Today, a history-making moment! Mrs. Vishnupriya Patel is aboard ISRO's very first manned mission to Mars!”



#genderstereotypes #unpredictable #talent #expectations #potential #defiance #achievement #inspiration
